ModMetaData.name: Ritual Outcome Selection 选择仪式结果
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
[h1] Ritual Outcome Selection 选择仪式结果 [/h1]
[h2] Description [/h2] This mod allows you to select the outcome of a ritual in RimWorld. By ritual, it means: - Attend Funeral - Blind Ritual - Dance Party - Child Birth - Execution - Speech - Trial - Sky Lantern - Gravship Launch - etc.
The motivation of this mod is to save some time for myself doing Save and Load to get the desired outcome of a ritual.
There's a mod option to enable/disable the ritual outcome selection for impossible results (0% chance).
[h2] 描述 [/h2] 这个mod允许你在RimWorld中选择仪式的结果。 仪式包括： - 参加葬礼 - 盲目仪式 - 舞会 - 生育 - 处决 - 演讲 - 审判 - 天灯节 - 逆重飞船发射 - 等等。
这个mod的目的是为了节省自己S/L的时间，以获得想要的仪式结果。
有模组选项可以启用/禁用不可能结果（0%几率）的仪式结果选择。
